title: Very Well-Rounded Hotel -
text:
I stayed at Eventi while in town for business and was very impressed with the experience. I arrived early and was unable to check into my room until 3pm, which gave me about an hour and a half to burn.
I went and enjoyed the some grilled fish and a few cups of coffee at Vine, which is accessible from the lobby sitting area. Both the fish dish and the coffee were great and I was able to get some work done.
At check-in, I was upgraded to a room on a higher floor. I didn't view this as a tremendous bonus until I arrived at my room and took in the incredible view from the 22nd floor. It was truly an upgrade and really made all the difference in my stay.
I was able to also catch dinner at Lupulo, which is not accessible via the lobby, but literally a few steps outside the front door. Our dinner and drinks were tremendous.
Overall, this is a very well located and well-appointed boutique in NY. I would recommend this to anyone on business or leisure.
Great spot -- I'll return for sure. Hopefully not on business next time.
